back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -1. After this test is resolved, each readied [[Cultist]] enemy moves one location away from you.
[cultist]: Reveal another token. If you fail this test discard an asset you control.
[tablet]: -2. If you fail, ready the nearest exhausted [[Monster]] enemy; if it engages you, it attacks.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you succeed, discard an [[Omen]] in play if you are at a [[Resonant]] location.
name: Jenny's Choice
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -1. (-2 if you are at a [[Resonant]] location.)
[cultist]: Reveal another token. If you fail this test shuffle an asset you control into your deck.
[tablet]: -1. If you fail, ready an exhausted enemy at your location.
[elder_thing]: -2. If you succeed, discard an [[Omen]] in play.

back_flavor:
A fairly unexceptional wine cellar appears to be at the end of the steps below.
No matter the religion, there's always alcohol involved. Just why is that, anyway?
Watch out. It's dark.
flavor: As excellent as you would expect from the Green Man himself. This should take the edge off. Now, where's Izzie again?
name: Wine Cellar
text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate this location: Gain a resource. Remember that You have tasted the Green Man's fermented fruits.

back_flavor:
A fairly unexceptional wine cellar appears to be at the end of the steps below.
No matter the religion, there's always alcohol involved. Just why is that, anyway?
Watch out. It's dark.
flavor: As excellent as you would expect from the Green Man himself. This should take the edge off. Now, where's Izzie again?
name: Wine Cellar
text: [reaction] After you successfully investigate this location: Heal a horror. Remember that You have tasted the Green Man's fermented fruits.

back_flavor: This room appears to be ceremonial in nature. You wonder if there is anything here that might help Izzie.
flavor: Trinkets and doodads are displayed here as if they are fated for some grand purpose. Maybe there is something of use.
name: Inner Chamber
text: Forced - Increase the shroud of this location by 1 for each [[Omen]] card in play. [reaction] After successfully investigating this location: Draw a card (group limit once per round).

back_flavor: This room appears to be ceremonial in nature. You wonder if there is anything here that might help Izzie.
flavor: Trinkets and doodads are displayed here as if they are fated for some grand purpose. Maybe there is something of use.
name: Inner Chamber
text: Forced - Decrease the shroud of this location by 1 for each [[Omen]] card in play. [reaction] After successfully investigating this location: Draw a card (group limit once per round).

back_flavor: At one time it looks as if this organ may have been used for regular mass services. You are loath to think how patient the Green Man must be to have seen entire religious sanctuaries be erected and fall into disrepair. His worshippers scheme into the far-flung future; the lives of two sisters mere blips in the vast ocean of time.
flavor: Trinkets and doodads are displayed here as if they are fated for some grand purpose. Maybe there is something of use.
name: Organ Room
text: Forced - Do not discover clues at this location when successfully investigating. Instead, you may discard a card from your hand to discard Discordant Piping from play. Forced - When Discordant Piping is discarded, investigators in this location each gain 1 clue.

back_flavor: At one time it looks as if this organ may have been used for regular mass services. You are loath to think how patient the Green Man must be to have seen entire religious sanctuaries be erected and fall into disrepair. His worshippers scheme into the far-flung future; the lives of two sisters mere blips in the vast ocean of time.
flavor: Trinkets and doodads are displayed here as if they are fated for some grand purpose. Maybe there is something of use.
name: Organ Room
text: Forced - Do not discover clues at this location when successfully investigating. Instead, you may spend 2 resources to discard Discordant Piping from play. Forced - When Discordant Piping is discarded, investigators in this location each gain 1 clue.

back_flavor:
A small stairwell leads to a viewing balcony above. The balastrade is held together by a growth of tangled vines.
Perhaps a bird's eye view of the area below will offer some clues as to Izzie's location.
flavor: A small balcony, there is not much here except a lovely view of the Ampitheatre below.
name: Balcony
text: [action] Test [agility](3): If you succeed, move to the Ampitheatre below. If you fail, you decide it looks a little too high: cancel the move.

back_flavor:

Perhaps a bird's eye view of the area below will offer some clues as to Izzie's location.

name: Balcony
text: [action] Test [willpower](3): If you succeed, move to the Ampitheatre below. If you fail, you decide it looks a little too high: cancel the move.
